ayahs.indonesian: Binasalah kedua tangan Abu Lahab dan benar-benar binasa dia!
ayahs.english: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he.

ayahs.arabic: مَا أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُ وَمَا كَسَبَ
ayahs.transliteration: Ma aghna AAanhu maluhu wama kasab
ayahs.indonesian: Tidaklah berguna baginya hartanya dan apa yang dia usahakan.
ayahs.english: His wealth will not avail him, nor that which he gained.

ayahs.indonesian: Kelak dia akan masuk ke dalam api yang bergejolak (neraka).
ayahs.english: He will [enter to] burn in a Fire of [blazing] flame.

ayahs.indonesian: Dan (begitu pula) istrinya, pembawa kayu bakar (penyebar fitnah).
ayahs.english: And his wife [as well]—the carrier of firewood.

ayahs.indonesian: Di lehernya ada tali dari sabut yang dipintal.
ayahs.english: Around her neck is a rope of [twisted] fiber.
